title: How to Add Power Steering to an Electric Hummer - (I know you're curious)
description: Its time to install Power Steering on the Hummer! HUGE Thanks to  for helping me get my parts so fast. Power steering is important in any vehicle, but especially heavy duty vehicles. The heavier the truck the more assistance it needs for steering.  We had power steering working on our Electric Hummer conversion previously, but it was loud. This new electric power steering motor will be MUCH quieter and MUCH more energy efficient. Our Hummer's name is 'Whisper' and  now it will be quiet enough to live up to that name.
